sentences.sentence: Generally all soldiers are better equipped and more soldiery and therefore more dangerous.
sentences.translation: 一般来说，所有的士兵都有更好的装备和更多的士兵，因此更危险。

sentences.sentence: Monsieur Defarge alighted; knowing one or two of the soldiery there, and one of the police.
sentences.translation: 德伐日认得那儿的两个士兵和一个警察。

sentences.sentence: I see also the dull, drilled, docile, brutish masses of the hun soldiery plodding on like swarm of crawling locusts.
sentences.translation: 我看见大批迟钝蠢笨，受过训练，惟命是从，粗野凶残的德国士兵，像一大群爬行的蝗虫在沉重缓慢地前进。
